reviewText: This is a great video. The tricks and skills of these guys are amazing. Going to see Nuclear Cowboyz next month, and this video gave us a small taste of what is in store for the show. Awesome!
By far the best riding video of all time. Amazing music, interviews and footage. I watch it religiously before I ride
I'm a HUGE Metal Mulisha fan, and This DVD truly Rocks, its amazing and worth every penny!!! The way they capture every moment of all the greats is incredible..
